definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: It belongs to the scope of personal liberty and is some.
sentences.chinese: 人身自由是公民全部權利中最基礎的和前提性的部分。

sentences.english: In order to prevent the artificial open fuse blasting caused the injury accident, the blasting technique was improved.
sentences.chinese: 爲防止人工明火放炮對人身傷害，改進了爆破技術。

sentences.english: Anson Chan decried the comments by Tsang as a "provocation and personal attack".
sentences.chinese: 陳方安生譴責曾德成的言論是挑釁及人身攻擊。

sentences.english: Students are advised to take out personal insurance to cover themselves against accident or illness.
sentences.chinese: 學生本人得自行購買人身保險，包括意外或健康保險。

sentences.english: Extracting a confession by torture infringes the personal rights of citizens with malice.
sentences.chinese: 刑訊逼供是一種惡意侵犯公民人身權利的違法行爲。

sentences.english: You are responsible for yourself and your child's personal and property safety.
sentences.chinese: 您須對您及跟隨您的孩子的人身和財產安全負責。

sentences.english: I accept the life accident insurance and medical insurance Organizing Committee insured for me.
sentences.chinese: 我接受組委會爲本人辦理的人身意外險和醫療險。

sentences.english: Person-oriented argumentation and fallacy of personal abuse should be distinguished.
sentences.chinese: “針對人的”論證與“人身攻擊”謬誤應加以區分。

sentences.english: One day of restricted freedom of person shall be offset against one day of administrative detention.
sentences.chinese: 限制人身自由一日，折抵行政拘留一日。

sentences.english: Adopt safe low voltage to guarantee the safety of human life.
sentences.chinese: 採用安全低電壓，保證人身安全。

sentences.english: Ad hominem is a blunt tool for cheappropagandists.
sentences.chinese: 人身攻擊是最低級別的政治宣傳方式。

sentences.english: Where can I buy the insurance for passenger?
It’s only too easy to misinterpret a critical comment about a piece of work as a personal attack.
sentences.chinese: 對於一項工作的批評太容易被誤解爲人身攻擊了。

sentences.english: The loss of personal identity and individual liberty are the powerful themes.
sentences.chinese: 電影的主題是個人身份和自由的喪失。

sentences.english: Some people would argue that the physical blow from a boy bully might be more acute, might be more dramatic, might be more dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 也許有人會說，男生的人身恐嚇威脅性更大，更危險。

sentences.english: So it is very necessary to define the concept of personal dangerousness.
sentences.chinese: 因此，正確廓清人身危險性的概念是刻不容緩的。

definition: surface of the body/periphery of the body/body thermometer/(literary) a person's appearance
main part/torso/the thing in itself/noumenon (object of purely intellectual perception according to Kant)
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
human shape/in human form/of human appearance/doll/puppet
the body/organism (usually human)/(fig.) fabric (of society etc)/cohesive structure (of an entity)
